data.event: Thomas Holt (1811–88) owned the land that stretched from Sutherland to Cronulla.
In a 1921 letter, James Murphy said "the name Miranda was given to the locality by me as manager of the Holt Sutherland Company which I formed in 1881.
In a 1921 letter, James Murphy said "the name Miranda was given to the locality by me as manager of the Holt Sutherland Company which I formed in 1881.

event.title: had not selected his parcel by 1816

data.event: He had not selected his parcel by 1816, when he chose to sell that promise to John Connell for £250.
However, in 1831 he also selected a parcel of land and claimed it under the original promise of reward, at which Connell stepped forward to claim the land.
